Name: Shades Of Heroes
About the game: Strategy Card Game Collect cards with unique abilities and build the perfect deck for your strategy. Use your wits to outsmart your opponents in a resource-based three line system arena and best them in battle, while climbing the ranks to become the hero that all will glorify or the shade that everyone will terrify... Good or Evil With the world descending into chaos, will you protect the light, or consume it? Choose between the forces of evil and the empire of men and turn the tides of the battle. 3 Player Co-Op Gather your friends and set forth on an epic battle where a commander takes the leading role alongside two frontliners and work together in taking down formidable foes. Select between three roles: Commander , Vanguard , Assaulter , and use your abilities, perks and wits to keep your allies alive and emerge victorious. Card Arena Battles - Use your army and skills to invade enemy territory or defend your castle against invading foes! PvP Matchmaking - Outwit your opponents in real-time 1v1 card battles! Deck Building - Amass an army of units with unique abilities and factions and create your perfect strategy! Tournaments - Compete against other players in PvP or other game modes and earn rewards the higher you place at the end of the tournament! Pillar Of Destiny - Fight in a series of relentless battles in a test of glory that will not leave you unrewarded! Character & Class Development - Level up your character and advance in branching classes that will aid you in battle! Generals - Recruit adventurers and heroes to join your cause and lead your troops, leveling them up and increasing their defensive capabilites! Daily Quests - Earn rewards everyday by reaching certain milestones! Daily Challenges & Treasure Hunting - Go on rounds of exciting adventures or seek treasure in the most dangerous of lairs! Valkyrie Mountain Adventure - Journey to the dangerous mountain in search for allies and earn their trust in glorious combat! Commander Quests - Send your generals on quests and reap the rewards of battle! Card Forging and Crafting - Collect items and recipes across your journeys and forge them into able-bodied units for your army! Event Campaigns and Quests - Frequently visit your town to not miss out on annual celebrations or unexpected turns of events! Cross-platform Shades Of Heroes is free to play and is available for PC on Steam as well as Android devices. This offers cross-platform gameplay, so by using the same account, you can show off your brilliant tactics and decks from the comfort of your room, or go for a quick and exciting battle anywhere else on your phone!
